updates.details: To address recent intermittent breaks in connection, specific interventions are planned on the RAL site firewall (affecting traffic into/out of JASMIN) on Friday 6th June between 13:30-14:40 and Wednesday 11th June, between 07:00-09:00. These will put in place a workaround to prolong periods of stability while the root cause (now understood) can be addressed. Further planned outages and the continued risk of unplanned outages will remain for some days/weeks to come. Apologies for any inconvenience meanwhile.
Users of XFC vol5: please clean up as this disk is now full so no further writes are possible.
